title: Canada Higher Education House | Password Reset
description: A site for researching and applying for scholarships in canada
heading: Password Reset
body: Enter the email you signed up with. We will send you an email with instructions on how to reset your password.

errorMessage.heading: Error
errorMessage.body: Something went weong processing your request. Please try again later or contact us.

invalidEmailMessage.heading: Invalid email
invalidEmailMessage.body: We could not find a user with that email.

successMessage.heading: We have received your prequest
successMessage.body: We will send an email to {email} with instructions on how to reset your password.
